nodes.documentation: @title A Proxy utilizing the Unstructured Storage pattern.
nodes.name: Proxy

nodes.documentation: @notice Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
nodes.name: onlyOwner

nodes.documentation: @notice Delegates calls to the implementation contract.

@notice Transfers ownership of Proxy to a new owner.
@param newOwner Address of the new owner account.

_setAndInitializeImplementation
_setImplementation

_setAndInitializeImplementation(address,.details: Throws if the initialization callback fails.If the target contract does not need initialization, use setImplementation instead.

params.callbackData: The abi-encoded function call to perform in the implementation contract.
params.implementation: Address of the new target contract.

_setImplementation(address).details: If the target contract needs to be initialized, call setAndInitializeImplementation instead.

params.implementation: Address of the new target contract.

params.newOwner: Address of the new owner account.

devdoc.title: A Proxy utilizing the Unstructured Storage pattern.

_setAndInitializeImplementation(address,.notice: Sets the address of the implementation contract and calls into it.

_setImplementation(address).notice: Sets the address of the implementation contract.

_transferOwnership(address).notice: Transfers ownership of Proxy to a new owner.
